creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: train bridge with tunnel beneath, with train engine in ULQ; tall wooden picket fence at right with steep slope beneath; three round structures at top of image
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and S bottom center, in the print: [Ch. Heyman / 1913];
title: Un pont boulevard Ney
